newsitem.title: USA: WPS to acquire Upper Peninsula.
newsitem.headline: WPS to acquire Upper Peninsula.

text.p: WPS Resources Corp said Thursday it has agreed to acquire Houghton, Michigan-based Upper Peninsula Energy Corp in a merger of Midwestern utility companies.

Under the deal, upper Peninsula shareholders will receive 0.9 shares of WPS for each share of Upper Peninsula they hold, the companies said. Based on about 2.9 million Upper Peninsula shares outstanding and Thursday's WPS clsoign price of 27-3/8, the deal has an indicated value of about $71.4 million
Upper Peninusla, whose principal subsidiary serves 48,000 in Michigan's Upper Peninsula will become a wholly-owned subisidary of WPS following the necessary regulatory approval, the compamnies said.
Upper Peninsula has a workforce of 423 and any reduction of the workforce will be through normal attrition or relocation, accoridng to the purchase agreement, the compamnies said.
The transaction will be structured as a tax-free stock exchange, the companies said.
After closing, the WPS board of directors will be expanded to 10 from nine, with one director nominated by Upper Peninsula, the companies said.
